price: 58. Mosusu azali te oyo akofungola yango na botiki Allah.
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: laysa lahā min dūni al-lahi kāshifatun
